issue.title: [Packaging] Add JDBC driver to release tasks
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17741](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17741). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The java-jars task has a list of artifacts to upload, the JDBC driver needs to be included there: https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/7cfdfbb0d5472f8f8893398b51042a3ca1dd0adf/dev/tasks/tasks.yml#L816-L820

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17741?focusedCommentId=17605901) by David Li (lidavidm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 14139
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14139>
